page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content:
ALTHOUGH THESE WERE THE MOST COMMON CHILDRENS ACTIVITIES, MUSIC, SCOUTS, GUIDES, CUBS ETC., WERE CONSISTENTLY POPULAR PASTIMES. THE CHILDREN AND ADULTS IN THE SURVEY FOR SOME REASON DID NOT MENTION TELEVISION OR VIDEO AS A HOBBY OR INTEREST.
THE WILLIAM DE FERRERS CENTRE PROVED TO BE WELL USED BY BOTH ADULTS AND CHILDREN ALIKE.
IN HULLBRIDGE, THE RESIDENTS HAD TO TRAVEL TO NEARBY HAWKWELL OR RAYLEIGH FOR SPORT CENTRE FACILITIES.
THERE ARE NO SWIMMING POOL FACILITIES IN S.W.F. OR HULLBRIDGE, IN SPITE OF THE FACT, BOTH ARE RIVERSIDE TOWNS.
